ABOUT.TITLE: About Norwegian Airports Explorer
ABOUT.PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Welcome to the Norwegian Airports Explorer, a comprehensive platform designed to provide real-time information about airports across Norway.

FEATURE_LIST.AIRPORTS: Complete listing of all airports in Norway
FEATURE_LIST.DEPARTURES: Real-time tracking of the next 5 departures for each airport
FEATURE_LIST.MAP: Interactive map integration showing airport locations

ABOUT.TECHNICAL_DESCRIPTION: Built with Angular and powered by the Airlabs API, this application demonstrates modern web development practices and real-time data integration.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.DEMO_TEXT: This contact form is a frontend demonstration only and is not connected to any backend service.
CONTACT.NAME: Name
